title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Skills: Mobile Application-Based Flipped Social Studies for Students with Total Blindness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Blind learners can accurately understand and reproduce core social studies materials at over 80% accuracy using text-to-speech functionality in mobile applications.
Through the flipped learning model, students can achieve over 90% participation by utilizing pre-provided digital resources.
In a VR simulation environment, students can improve spatial cognition of historical events/social phenomena by over 70%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
